description: Maximal run length in base 15 representation of n.
maple: A043289 := proc(n) dgs := convert(n,base,15) ; a :=1 ; rl :=1 ; for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do if op(i,dgs) <> op(i-1,dgs) then a := max(a,rl) ; rl := 1; else rl := rl+1 ; end if; end do: a := max(a,rl) ; a; end proc; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 11 2012
crossrefs: Cf. A043276-A043290 for base-2 to base-16 analogs.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
